updateElements.mainContentText:
Apple have released a new security update to patch recently identified vulnerabilities; Caulfield Grammar School managed devices are required to update to the latest version.

Over the next 7-days you will receive a daily prompt to update. On the final day this prompt cannot be dismissed and you will be forced to update.

If you receive the prompt and you cannot run the update at that time, please go to
ï£¿ System Settings, click Software Update to manually run the update to avoid reaching the 7 day limit.

If you would like more information on the update process please select More Info.

If you require any assistance during the update process please contact Caulfield Grammar School's support team on xxxx xxx xxx
